duplicate_detection_failures: DUPLICADA-Decisao-adm-08_09_2006-ilegivel.pdf — SHA-256 cannot detect duplicates from different scans

classification_analysis.summary: Pipeline detected boundaries for all 42 ground truth pieces (41 matched by type, 1 duplicate not flagged). Main weakness is type vocabulary: 83.4% of segments classified as catch-all 'decisao-interlocutoria'. Boundary detection is strong (223 segments for 1089 pages = ~4.9 pages/segment avg).

sentenca.match: partial (2 extra sentenças from full process)

acordao.match: no GT equivalent (likely tribunal decisions in full process)

decisao-interlocutoria.match: catch-all absorbs pareceres, oficios, memorandos, laudos, recursos, impugnacoes, manifestacoes, defesas, contrarrazoes

performance_notes.bottleneck: OCR (1089 pages all routed to tesseract — no digital-only pages detected)
performance_notes.recommendation: Improve digital text detection to avoid unnecessary OCR on embedded-text pages

match_rate_60pct.notes: 97.6% match rate (41/42 pieces matched by type)

time_under_15min.notes: 34m 53s exceeds 15min criterion. Root cause: all 1089 pages routed to OCR

verdict: PASS — EXCELENTE (match rate). Pipeline survived 1089-page stress test without crash. Boundary detection excellent (223 segments). Classification vocabulary too narrow (6 types vs 20+ real types). Time exceeded 15min due to full OCR on all pages.
